mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipe (rcp_writer, rcp_title, rcp_content, serving_size, cooking_time, cooking_level, ingredients, rcp_viewCount, rcp_regdate, main_org_name, main_save_name, main_path) VALUES (#{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{servingSize}, #{cookingTime}, #{cookingLevel}, #{ingredients}, #{viewCount}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{mainOrgName}, #{mainSaveName}, #{mainPath})
mapper.select:
SELECT rcp_num AS rcpNum, rcp_writer AS writer, rcp_title AS title, main_org_name AS mainOrgName, main_save_name AS mainSaveName, main_path AS mainPath FROM recipe
ORDER BY rcp_num DESC LIMIT #{startRowNum}, #{endRowNum}

SELECT rcp_num AS rcpNum, rcp_writer AS writer, rcp_title AS title, rcp_content AS content, serving_size AS servingSize, cooking_time AS cookingTime, cooking_level AS cookingLevel, ingredients, rcp_viewCount AS viewCount, rcp_regdate AS regdate, main_org_name AS mainOrgName, main_save_name AS mainSaveName, main_path AS mainPath FROM recipe WHERE rcp_num=#{rcpNum}
